main event: A sighting of an oval-shaped silver-gray object following an erratic course, reported near Valparaiso, Indiana.
interesting points: The object hovered, then moved rapidly and disappeared without making any sound., Witnesses reported hearing a sound like an airplane but different., The object was stationary and blinking, estimated to be 30-40 feet in diameter and up to 150 feet long., The nearest air force base confirmed radar tracking of the object., The investigating officer found no logical explanation for the sightings.
witness description: two individuals observing from a yard
